core.messages
Class ConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      core.messages.ConnectionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Thread

Connection manager This class contains the socket and is responsable for writting and reading objects from a stream This class includes the owner of the message when it writes it to the socket, deals with identification of the other peer, (Messages with type handshake), deals with broadcast messages

Author:
GelidElf

waitTilMessageReceivedAndReturnPeer

public CommunicationIds waitTilMessageReceivedAndReturnPeer()
This method waits until a message is received, identifies the other peer by the messages owner and processes the message

Returns:
the identification of the peer

trataMensajeRecibido

private void trataMensajeRecibido(Message message)
Processes the message, prints that a message was received in console, and depending on the destination of the message is included in the inbox or resent if we are the master

Parameters:
message - the message to process

Returns:

reenviamos

private void reenviamos(Message message)
This method sends the message through the communication manager, this way broadcast messages or particular messages will be handled by the appropiate communication manager

Parameters:
message - the message to resend

somosElMaster

private boolean somosElMaster()
Method that identifies if the owner of this connection manager is the master automata, used to allow to resend broadcast or messages intended for other automatas

Returns:
true if this connectionManager is owned by the master, false otherwise

somosDestinatariosDelMensaje

private boolean somosDestinatariosDelMensaje(Message message)
Method that will check if this connectionManager is the destination of the message

Parameters:
message - that contains the destination to evaluate
Returns:
true if the destination in the message is the owner, or if the message is a broadcast
